module.name: versiontypes
module.short: Contains classes used by version information resource

descr.p: This unit contains classes used by TVersionResource.

element.name: EVersionStringTableException
element.short: Base class for version string table - related exceptions

element.name: ENameNotAllowedException
element.short: String table name not allowed error

descr.p: This exception is raised when an attempt is made to set Name property of with a string that isn't an 8-cipher hexadecimal string.

element.name: EKeyNotFoundException
element.short: Key not found error

descr.p: This exception is raised when the specified key is not found in the object.

element.name: EDuplicateKeyException
element.short: Duplicate key error

descr.p: This exception is raised when an attempt is made to add an item to a object and the specified key is already present.

element.name: TFileProductVersion
element.short: File or Product version type

descr.p: This type is a 4-element array of words that is used to represent a file or product version.
Major version number is stored in the lowest word
Product version 4.2.1.1200 can be represented this way

element.name: TVerTranslationInfo
element.short: A language - codepage pair

descr.p: This record represents a language id - codepage pair that is used by .

element.name: TVerTranslationInfo.language
element.short: The language id

element.name: TVerTranslationInfo.codepage
element.short: The codepage

element.name: PVerTranslationInfo
element.short: Pointer to a TVerTranslationInfo

element.name: TVersionFixedInfo
element.short: Language independent part of version information

descr.p: This class represents the language independent part of version information, and is always present in a version information resource.

element.name: TVersionFixedInfo.FileVersion
element.short: The file version

element.name: TVersionFixedInfo.ProductVersion
element.short: The product version

element.name: TVersionFixedInfo.FileFlagsMask
element.short: Mask for FileFlags

descr.p: This property specifies which bits of FileFlags are valid.
Usually it is VS_FFI_FILEFLAGSMASK.

element.name: TVersionFixedInfo.FileFlags
element.short: The file flags

descr.p: It is a combination of the following values:

element.name: TVersionFixedInfo.FileOS
element.short: The operating system the file was designed to run on

descr.p: It is one of the following values:
combined with one of the following values:
Note: some predefined combinations do exist:

element.name: TVersionFixedInfo.FileType
element.short: The type of the file

descr.p: It can be one of the following values:

element.name: TVersionFixedInfo.FileSubType
element.short: Additional type information

descr.p: This property is meaningful only for some values of FileSubType. For all other types, this property must be zero.
If FileSubType is VFT_DRV:
If FileSubType is VFT_FONT:

element.name: TVersionFixedInfo.FileDate
element.short: The file creation timestamp.

descr.p: It is a 64 bit timestamp.

element.name: TVersionStringTable
element.short: Version information for a specific language-codepage combination

descr.p: This class represents version information for a specific language-codepage combination.
It is contained in a object.
Information is stored as key-value pairs. The name of the string table specifies the language id - codepage to which the object applies.
There are some predefined keys that Microsoft Windows searches for. They are:

ul.li: PrivateBuild (only if VS_FF_PRIVATEBUILD is set in )
SpecialBuild (only if VS_FF_SPECIALBUILD is set in )

element.name: TVersionStringTable.Create
element.short: Creates a new string table

descr.p: Creates a new string table with the name passed as aName parameter.
aName must be a hex representation of a 4-bytes unsigned number: first 4 ciphers represent the language id, and last 4 the codepage.
This code creates a string table for Italian, with unicode codepage.

errors.p: If name is not a valid 8-cipher hexadecimal string, an exception is raised.

element.name: TVersionStringTable.Create.aName
element.short: The name of the string table

element.name: TVersionStringTable.Destroy
element.short: Destroys the string table

element.name: TVersionStringTable.Add
element.short: Adds a new item to the string table

descr.p: This methods adds a new key-value pair to the string table.
Note that some predefined keys do exist. See for further information.

errors.p: If an item with the same key already exists, an exception is raised.

element.name: TVersionStringTable.Add.aKey
element.short: The key of the item to add

element.name: TVersionStringTable.Add.aValue
element.short: The value of the item to add

element.name: TVersionStringTable.Clear
element.short: Deletes all items

descr.p: This method empties the object deleting all items.

element.name: TVersionStringTable.Delete
element.short: Deletes an item

descr.p: The item to delete can be specified by its index or by its key.

errors.p: If aKey is not found, an exception is raised.

element.name: TVersionStringTable.Delete.aIndex
element.short: The index of the item to delete

element.name: TVersionStringTable.Delete.aKey
element.short: The key of the item to delete

element.name: TVersionStringTable.Name
element.short: The name of the string table

descr.p: Name must be a hex representation of a 4-bytes unsigned number: first 4 ciphers represent the language id, and last 4 the codepage.

errors.p: If an attempt is made to set Name with a string that isn't an 8-cipher hexadecimal string, an exception is raised.

element.name: TVersionStringTable.Count
element.short: The number of items in the object

element.name: TVersionStringTable.Keys
element.short: Indexed array of keys in the object

descr.p: This property can be used to access all keys in the object.
Values associated to keys are stored in ValuesByIndex property: a key and its value have the same index in the two properties.
descr.remark: This array is 0-based: valid elements range from 0 to Count-1.
descr.p: Note that some predefined keys do exist. See for further information.

element.name: TVersionStringTable.Keys.index
element.short: The index of the key to access.

element.name: TVersionStringTable.ValuesByIndex
element.short: Indexed array of values in the object

descr.p: This property can be used to access all values in the object.
Keys associated to values are stored in Keys property: a key and its value have the same index in the two properties.
descr.remark: This array is 0-based: valid elements range from 0 to Count-1.

element.name: TVersionStringTable.ValuesByIndex.index
element.short: The index of the value to access.

element.name: TVersionStringTable.Values
element.short: Array of values in the object, accessed by key

descr.p: This property can be used to retrieve the value of an item when the corresponding key is known.
If you need to iterate over all values of the string table, use ValuesByIndex instead.
If the key is not found, an exception is raised.

element.name: TVersionStringTable.Values.Key
element.short: The key of the value to access

element.name: TVersionStringFileInfo
element.short: Language dependent part of version information

descr.p: This class represents the language dependent part of version information.
It is a list of objects, each representing information for a specific language-codepage combination.

element.name: TVersionStringFileInfo.Destroy
element.short: Destroys the object

descr.remark: All items are destroyed as well.

element.name: TVersionStringFileInfo.Add
element.short: Adds a new string table

element.name: TVersionStringFileInfo.Add.aStrTable
element.short: The string table to add

element.name: TVersionStringFileInfo.Clear
element.short: Deletes all string tables in the list

descr.p: This method empties the object. All string tables are freed.

element.name: TVersionStringFileInfo.Delete
element.short: Deletes a string table

descr.p: This method removes the string table identified by aIndex from the list. The string table is freed.

element.name: TVersionStringFileInfo.Delete.aIndex
element.short: The index of the string table to delete.

element.name: TVersionStringFileInfo.Count
element.short: The number of string tables in the object

element.name: TVersionStringFileInfo.Items
element.short: Indexed array of string tables in the object

descr.p: This property can be used to access all string tables in the object.
descr.remark: This array is 0-based: valid elements range from 0 to Count-1.

element.name: TVersionStringFileInfo.Items.index
element.short: The index of the string table to access

element.name: TVersionVarFileInfo
element.short: List of supported languages

descr.p: This class represents the language-codepage pairs that the program or dll supports. It can be used to avoid including several RT_VERSION resources for each language-codepage supported.
It is a list of records.

element.name: TVersionVarFileInfo.Destroy
element.short: Destroys the object

descr.p: All items are destroyed as well.

element.name: TVersionVarFileInfo.Add
element.short: Adds a new translation information item

element.name: TVersionVarFileInfo.Add.aInfo
element.short: The element to add

element.name: TVersionVarFileInfo.Clear
element.short: Deletes all items

descr.p: This method empties the object deleting all items.

element.name: TVersionVarFileInfo.Delete
element.short: Deletes an item

element.name: TVersionVarFileInfo.Delete.aIndex
element.short: The index of the item to delete

element.name: TVersionVarFileInfo.Count
element.short: The number of items in the object

element.name: TVersionVarFileInfo.Items
element.short: Indexed array of items in the object

descr.p: This property can be used to access all translation information items in the object.
descr.remark: This array is 0-based: valid elements range from 0 to Count-1.

element.name: TVersionVarFileInfo.Items.index
element.short: The index of the item to access
